name: MASH Lite
description:
The Classic Free MASH: Mansion Apartment Shack House game for iPhone and iPad!

OVER 14 MILLION DOWNLOADS OF MASH & MASH LITE!

Want to find out who you or your friends will marry? Are you going to live in a beautiful, spacious mansion, or a cramped, drafty shack?

After playing MASH Lite you'll find out where you'll go to college, what you'll do for a living, and even how many kids you'll have. Play it with your friends!
------------------------------------------
MASH has been featured as an App Store Essential by Apple! (Full version)
- Number 1 Kids game in US
- Number 1 Word game in US
- Top 40 Paid App in US
- Top 25 All Games in US
Featured as a "What's Hot" iPad Game
------------------------------------------

• Easy to pick up and play - simply name colleges, honeymoon destinations, jobs, and so on.
• Game progress is automatically saved, even if you're interrupted. Simply pick up where you left off!
• Experience crafted for the unique iPhone and iPod touch interface. Includes iPad version!
• Original artwork by cartoonist Scott McMahon.
• Send your story to your friends via e-mail, Facebook, Twitter and more when you're done.
• Be sure to check out the full version of MASH to find out where you'll go on your honeymoon, what kind of pet you'll have, and even what kind and color car you'll drive!
• New feature in Full version: Passcode lock your saved stories! Keep them safe from prying eyes.

MASH Lite from Magnate Interactive. Check out our website at http://MashApp.com

------------------------------------------
